name: Noxious stimulation and baseline recordings of ON, OFF and Neutral cells in the rat rostral ventromedial medulla
citation: Ashworth, Carl (2026) Noxious stimulation and baseline recordings of ON, OFF and Neutral cells in the rat rostral ventromedial medulla (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001708/draft
description: Dataset consisting of single-electrode recordings in lightly anesthetized Sprague-Dawley rats, during both unstimulated periods of activity lasting roughly 25 minutes, and multiple episodes of noxious hind paw stimulation with heat ramp and noxious pinch. For the accompanying preprint see https://doi.org/10.64898/2025.12.15.693905.
